TextView.android:text: Request for Review of Disbursement Vouchers and Supporting Documents with Bidding (Infrastructure Projects)
This service checks for the completeness, propriety and mathematical accuracy of the documents.
All employees of the Municipal Government of Kitaotao
1 Original and 3 Photocopies of the following documents
3. Certified Copy of the page of the Approved Annual Procurement Plan (APP) or Supplemental APP where the Infrastructure Projects, subject for payment, is indicated
4. Certified Copy of the submitted contract or Purchase Order stamped “Received” by COA
5. Letter Request for payment from Contractor
6. Irrevocable Standby Letter of Credit/Security Bond/Bank Guarantee (Advance payment for mobilization)
7. Notice of Award (Advance payment for mobilization)
8. Notice to Proceed (Advance payment for mobilization)
Additional Requirements for Progress and Final Payment
• Inspection Report by the Agency’s Authorized Engineer
• Result of Test Analysis, if applicable
• Contractor’s Affidavit on payment of laborers and materials
• Pictures / Geotagged photos, before, during and after construction of items of work especially the embedded items
• Copy of turn-over documents/transfer of project and facilities (For Final Payment)
• Certificate of Acceptance by the Agency (For Final Payment)
Additional Requirements for Release of Retention Money
• Any security in the form of cash, bank guarantee, irrevocable standby letter of credit from a commercial bank, GSIS or surety bond callable on demand
• Certificate from the end user that the project is completed, inspected, and accepted
1. Submit Disbursement Voucher with complete supporting documents to the Accounting Office
1.1. Evaluate the completeness, check for mathematical accuracy, and control the voucher as to the availability of funds
Administrative Aide II\n Municipal Accounting Office

Administrative Aide II
Municipal Accounting Office

MAA-II
Municipal Accounting Office
1.3. Review and sign the disbursement voucher
1.4. Submit approved voucher and documents to Treasurer’s Office for check issuance
2. Accomplish the Client Satisfaction Service (CSS) Form and drop in the CSS drop box
2.1. Request the client to accomplish the Client Satisfaction Service (CSS) form
